I am a new user of Cantera. I want to use another CK mechanism 
instead of the gri30.inp to run "ZERO-D" gas kinetics model. Since 
the unit of Ea (activation enegy) in my testing CK mechanism 
is "kJ/mol", which is different from the one used in gri30.inp 
("cal/mol"), is there any easy way to make the "unit convertion" in 
Zero-D model so I don't need to convert the Ea in my CK mechansim 
file from "kJ/mol" to "cal/mol" before run the code directly.

Thanks,

Yi
